episodes.title: Obsessed: A Cults Mini-series – Lisa Nowak
episodes.description: Who we are at work is usually very different than who we are as people. Follow us @wednesday_queen on Twitter and check out our other show, The Society Pages: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/queen-wednesday-productions/id1463300357

episodes.title: Obsessed: A Cults Mini-series – John Hinckley Jr.
episodes.description: Halle and Stasie zoom in from the group obsession of cults to the individual obsession of some of the world's most infamous stalkers. And hoo boy, is this first one a doozy. Follow us @wednesday_queen on T witter and check out our other show, The Society Pages: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/queen-wednesday-productions/id1463300357

episodes.title: #57 - Falun Gong
episodes.description: EXPERIENCE SHEN YUN – nah, we're just kidding. It is part of this cult, though. Follow us on Twitter at @wednesday_queen and email us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: The Society Pages - "Pilot"
episodes.description: Something different. If you want more: https://www.patreon.com/queenwednesday Contact us at queenwednesdayproductions@gmail.com and on Twitter @wednesday_queen

episodes.title: #56 - KKK, Part Two
episodes.description: Medgar Evers deserved better. Find us on Facebook and email us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com

episodes.title: #55 - KKK, Part One
episodes.description: Celebrate Super Bowl weekend by listening to Halle and Stasie discuss the granddaddy of all hate groups. Contact us as cultsofourlives@gmail.com and find us on Facebook!

episodes.title: #54 - Congregation for the Light
episodes.description: The girls are back for a Christmas special/to spite all those iTunes reviewers that called us "feminist-leaning garbage"! Let's talk about an upper crust Manhattan cult that dream of no longer having stomachs. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and in our Facebook group.

episodes.title: [SEMI-FINALE] #53 - Church of Wells
episodes.description: Our last episode...at least for now. Halle and Stasie go down to the always reliable Texas to send off our series with a millennial cult. We love you guys so much. Until we meet again.

episodes.title: #52 - Incels
episodes.description: "You're going to go through life thinking that girls don't like you because you're a nerd. And I want you to know, from the bottom of my heart, that that won't be true. It'll be because you're an asshole." Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and on Facebook!

episodes.title: #51 - Rajneeshees
episodes.description: In a jumbo episode, Halle and Stasie get into an argument about Tonya Harding, and also discuss an Indian cult that legally took over a small Oregon town. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and on Facebook!

episodes.title: #50 - The Pana-Wave Laboratory
episodes.description: For our 50th episode, Halle and Stasie discuss a truly ridiculous cult famous for kidnapping seals and running away from lightbulbs. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and on Facebook!

episodes.title: #49 - Twelve Tribes, Part Two
episodes.description: [REISSUE] We conclude our series on Gene's Worst Parents Ever Club while Stasie battles the flu. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and on Facebook!

episodes.title: #48 - Twelve Tribes, Part One
episodes.description: The first half of what Halle calls "a crime turducken". Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and on Facebook!

episodes.title: #47 - Columbiners
episodes.description: Crime Fandom goes crazy and the cult's foiled February 14th shooting, just in time for Valentine's Day. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com or on Facebook!

episodes.title: #46 - Quiverfull
episodes.description: The Turpin family captives and a cult big on procreating are the girls' topics today. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com or on Facebook!

episodes.title: #45 - Dahn Yoga
episodes.description: Literally the first thing that comes up when you google Dahn Yoga is "THE YOGA CULT". This is why we don't exercise. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com or find us on Facebook.

episodes.title: #44 - Playboy Mansion
episodes.description: Happy 2018! The girls take a look at the supposedly sexy, often cultish home of the late Hugh Hefner

episodes.title: #43 - Ant Hill Kids
episodes.description: Ya girls look at the most violent cult we've ever seen. It's enough to shut even Halle up. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and on Facebook!Sudio Headphones: https://goo.gl/kzWb8d

episodes.title: #42 - NXIVM
episodes.description: The ladies tackle the unpronounceable business cult that entraps Smallville actresses. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com or on Facebook!

episodes.title: #41 - Oneida Community
episodes.description: Stasie and Halle talk about the cult that probably makes your silverware. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com or on Facebook!

episodes.title: #40 - The Wessons
episodes.description: Incest Vampires? No, it's not a new CW show, it's our cult this week. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com or on Facebook

episodes.title: #39 - Ave Maria Town
episodes.description: A listener suggestion sends Halle and Stasie into the world of company towns, a Domino's CEO gone mad with power, and Florida. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and on Facebook!

episodes.title: #38 - Aggressive Christianity
episodes.description: REISSUE WITH NON-****** AUDIO. The Generals Green and their band of christian scientists are at it again. Contact as at cultsofourlives@gmail.com or on Facebook.

episodes.title: #37 - R. Kelly's Cult
episodes.description: A cult fresh off the presses, the girls dive into the still developing story of the "I Believe I Can Fly" singer's long history of sexual abuse, going to extremes to control his entourage, and recent allegations of abduction. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and on Facebook.

episodes.title: #36 - Morrisites
episodes.description: Halle & Stasie go back to the 18th century and the wild, wild west with the Morrisites. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and on Facebook!

episodes.title: Minisode #4 - Charlottesville & the Alt-Right
episodes.description: This is not a normal episode. To be fair, this is not a normal country. Halle and Stasie discuss today's attack in Charlottesville and scream about Nazis. A longer episode will be coming soon. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com

episodes.title: #35 - The Family (Australia) Part 2
episodes.description: The back end of our look at Australia's Most Shitty, with an unnecessary chunk at the end where we divide up who in the Pacific Rim movies we each want to sleep with. Before you complain, know that Halle honestly cut that part down a lot. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and on Facebook!

episodes.title: #34 - The Family (Australia), Part 1
episodes.description: This is Stasie's new favorite cult, and Halle joins her as they go down under to talk about Anne Hamilton-Byrne and her creepy as hell psychiatric hospital. Contacts us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and on Facebook!

episodes.title: Minisode #3 - The Cult of Antinous
episodes.description: A Stasie solo episode as she takes us back to ancient Greece, Rome, and a story about how lost love can create entire reglious movements. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and Cults of Our Lives Podcast on Facebook!

episodes.title: #33 - The Nation of Yahweh
episodes.description: Halle and Stasie break down the black supremacist cult with a penchant for cutting off people's ears. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and join us on Facebook at Cults of Our Lives Podcast!

episodes.title: #32 - OneTaste
episodes.description: In this EXTREMELY NSFW episode, Halle and Stasie discuss a business/cult dedicated to the female orgasm. Listen to the end for information on our new summer schedule, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and on Facebook at Cults of Our Lives Podcast!

episodes.title: #31 - The Blackburn Cult
episodes.description: Halle and Stasie discuss mother-and-daughter cult leaders in 1930s California. Also, Halle can't read and Stasie can't get a Wi-Fi signal. We try our best. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and Cults of Our Lives Podcast on Facebook!

episodes.title: #30 - Westboro Baptist Church, Part Two
episodes.description: Halle and Stasie wrap up our series on the worst people in Kansas as well as the incredible humanity the rest of us respond to them with. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and join us on Facebook at Cults of Our Lives Podcast!

episodes.title: #29 - Westboro Baptist Church, Part One
episodes.description: Halle and Stasie reunite on American soil to discuss a cult with down-home American values, like sexism and homophobia. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast!

episodes.title: #28 - New Mathura Vrindavan
episodes.description: Halle and Stasie discuss an Indian-born, West Virginia-bred cult. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and on Facebook at Cults of Our Lives Podcast!

episodes.title: #27 - Order of the Solar Temple
episodes.description: Halle and Stasie remotely discuss the much-requested French-Swiss cult, Order of the Solar Temple, as well as why no one in cosmic cults know the difference between planets and stars. Contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast!

episodes.title: #26 - Berkley Psychic Cult
episodes.description: In this shortie-but-sweetie, Halle and Stasie discuss the mystical cult in Berkley, California and to what degree they believe in psychics. Email us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com and join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast!

episodes.title: #25 - The Community
episodes.description: Today Halle and Stasie discuss Tyler Deaton, how internalized homophobia will doom us all, and drink a lot of rosé. Cuz we're fancy as shit. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and email us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: #24 - The Brethren
episodes.description: Annnnnnnd we're back! Halle and Stasie reunite in Paris to talk about the most decidedly unglamorous and Paris-y cult: The Brethren, otherwise known as The Garbage Eaters. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: Minisode #2 - Rick Ross, Cult Deprogrammer (Rick Alan Ross)
episodes.description: What the world has been waiting for - a Halle-centric episode. Next week will be back to our regularly scheduled cults, but for today, please enjoy a discussion of cults most famous enemy - and if he doesn't have a dark past as well. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: #23 - Church of Bible Understanding
episodes.description: It's the carpet cleaner cult! Halle and Stasie discuss piece of shit Stewart Traill and his cult's predilection for snatching children. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: Minisode #1 - Fiat Lux
episodes.description: The very cool Julia fills in as Stasie's co-host in this mini-look into a little German cult, armed with plenty of singing and recommendations. Halle isn't jealous at all. Whatever. This cult sounds like a car. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: #22 - The Process
episodes.description: Halle and Stasie discuss the listener recommended, female-led cult, The Process. Because we're feminists! Women can be monsters too! Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!
subjects: Process Church of the Final Judgement

episodes.title: #21 - Moonies
episodes.description: It's the wedding episode! Halle and Stasie discuss the mass-marrying-Moonies - try saying that five times fast- and chat about the finer points of a friend's wedding who you don't even know. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: #20 - Scientology, Part Two
episodes.description: In the conclusion of our Scientology series, Halle and Stasie discuss the notable craziness of SeaOrg, The Commodore's Messengers, and The Hole, as well as stutter and "um" enough to rival The King's Speech. We're so tired, guys. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: #19 - Scientology, Part One
episodes.description: Oh man, it's the big one. Halle and Stasie discuss the insane sci-fi roots of Hollywood's most famous cult, the mysterious disappearance of Shelly Miscavige, and the trials of knowing a 12-year-old. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: #18 - Freedomites
episodes.description: Thanks to a listener recommendation, Halle and Stasie tackle a Canadian cult, eh! Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast.Also, now that we've marched, donate $5 to do some good: https://secure.ppaction.org/site/Donation2?df_id=12913&12913.donation=form1

episodes.title: #17 - Raelism
episodes.description: This week, Halle and Stasie talk about the sex, alien, and cloning-obsessed followers of Raelism, which is DEFINITELY NOT CATHOLICISM. Also, Halle discusses how good marketing can make or break a cult and Stasie peruses another bizarre website. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at Cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: #16 - IRA
episodes.description: Happy 2017! Halle and Stasie have a sleepy episode discussing the Irish Republican Army, Our continuing action movie project ideas for Matt Damon, and WHAT THE FUCK MARTHA POPE MEANS. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and email us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com! SOMEONE TELL US WHO MARTHA POPE IS.

episodes.title: #15 - The Family International
episodes.description: Happy Holidays! Halle and Stasie spread cheer by discussing insane incest cult The Family International. Halle also gives a history lesson on real verses fictional popes and Stasie tries not to strangle her in the spirit of Christmas. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: #14 - Waco, Part Two
episodes.description: A slightly-delayed but nevertheless concluding chapter, where Halle and Stasie talk about the Waco Siege and the very weird American tradition of buying objects that used to belong to celebrities. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com

episodes.title: #13 - Waco, Part One
episodes.description: It's another two-parter as Halle and Stasie take you to Waco, Texas and the how the Branch Davidians imploded, to quote John Green, slowly, and then all at once. (I also apologize for the sticky bullshit that you can hear a lot at the beginning - I'm not an audio technician.) Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!Amy's Links:http://www.icsahome.com/elibrary/booklisthttp://openmindsfoundation.org/professional-resources/recommended-reading

episodes.title: #12 - Opus Dei
episodes.description: This week, Halle and Stasie talk about Catholic cult Opus Dei in between misremembering Matt Damon movies and losing control of their motor skills. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and email us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: #11 - Holy Rollers
episodes.description: It's back to 1903 as Halle and Stasie discuss the original holy rollers - the Oregon cult Bride of Christ. We also talk a lot about Downton Abbey and Arrested Development. It tracks, trust us. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and email us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: #10 - North Korea, Part Two
episodes.description: It's Cults of Our Lives on the road as Stasie and Halle come at you from Boston to finish our series on North Korea, it's prison camps, the movie The Interview, and the enduring hope for the human spirit. Also, Stasie's dogs keep jumping on the computer and it's super annoying. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and email us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: #9 - North Korea, Part One
episodes.description: We decide to mourn post-election by discussing another cult of political tyranny. Stasie's cat attempts to stop our broadcast and Halle turns into a Benedict Cumberbatch character without the brains. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: #8 - Manson Family
episodes.description: Halle and Stasie go back to 1967 to talk about how Charles Manson and his followers went on a murderous rampage during the summer of love. Also, we talk about our fans and urge you to VOTE. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and email us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com

episodes.title: #7 - Fundamentalist Latter Day Saints
episodes.description: Happy Halloween! Nothing is more terrifying than the misogyny that effects each and every one of us - but especially the members of the polygamous FLDS cult. Also, meet Stasie's new kitten! Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: #6 - The Movement For The Restoration Of The 10 Commandments
episodes.description: Halle and Stasie discuss a Ugandan cult with a ridiculously long name, as well as childhood thievery and the power of human greed. It's a real fun time. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and email us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!
subjects: Movement for the Restoration of the Ten Commandments of God

episodes.title: #5 - Jonestown, Part 2
episodes.description: The second half of Halle and Stasie's mega-Jonestown-episode, where we talk about the tragic mass suicide at Jonestown, Congressman Leo Ryan...and a weird amount about TV's Jonah Ryan. Don't drink and podcast, kids. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: #4 - Jonestown, Part 1
episodes.description: It's Cults of Our Lives' first two-parter! Halle and Stasie start covering the mother of all cults, the internationally infamous Jonestown and lunacy of Jim Jones that kicked it off. Also, Halle has a bunch of fun facts about geography and Stasie gets tipsy on legal, 21st birthday wine. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: #3 - Symbionese Liberation Army
episodes.description: This week, we discuss 1970s cult/heiress kidnappers/general menaces to society the Symbionese Liberation Army. Halle compares herself to both Mozart and Shakespeare, and Stasie has a lot of questions about life. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: #2 - Heaven's Gate
episodes.description: In our second episode, Halle and Stasie discuss the life and death of science fiction obsessed cult Heaven's gate. Also, Stasie spots a gopher and Halle won't shut up about outer space. Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!

episodes.title: #1 - Aum Shinrikyo
episodes.description: Cults of Our Lives kicks off as Halle and Stasie discuss notorious and hardcore Japanese cult Aum Shinrikyo. Also, Stasie has pneumonia, we rag on Canada and plug Bob's Burgers.Join our Facebook group Cults of Our Lives Podcast, and contact us at cultsofourlives@gmail.com!
